scripts.test-dom: REACT_APP_CONFIG=development TZ=UTC LANG=en_US.UTF-8 CI=true react-scripts test '\.dom\.(spec|test)\.[jt]s[x]?$' --env=jsdom
scripts.test-e2e: REACT_APP_CONFIG=development TZ=UTC LANG=en_US.UTF-8 CI=true react-scripts test '\.e2e\.(spec|test)\.[jt]s[x]?$' --env=jsdom --runInBand
scripts.use-config-development: cd ../sanes-chrome-extension && yarn use-config-development && yarn override-config-development && cd ../sil-voting-app
scripts.test-single: yarn use-config-development && REACT_APP_CONFIG=development TZ=UTC LANG=en_US.UTF-8 CI=true react-scripts test --env=jsdom
scripts.test: yarn use-config-development && yarn test-dom && yarn test-e2e
